grammarNote.title: ため: Purpose and Cause
grammarNote.explanation:
みんなの為にやった — did it for everyone's sake. 友達の為にする — do it for a friend. ため marks purpose or beneficiary.

取り戻すのは大変だった — getting it back was tough. 驚くことがある — surprising things exist (ことがある = such things happen).

Also notice 所為: スニフの所為だ — it's Sniff's fault. 所為 marks blame, the opposite of ため.

Re-read and find: ため (purpose) and 所為 (blame).

vocabulary.meaning: for the sake of, because of
